subject: How to call a shell script from JUNIT.
msgSnippet: Hi All, I want to call a SHELL script from JUNIT. This SHELL Script will execute server code. Could anyone help me in resolving this. Thanks in advance!! Syed
messageBody:
Hi All,

I want to call a SHELL script from JUNIT. This SHELL
Script will execute server code.

Could anyone help me in resolving this.

Thanks in advance!!

Syed
